evidence_span: To verify the burst criterion model, single-rod transient burst tests in steam were performed using fuel rod simulators with indirect electric heating. The test parameters covered the following ranges: internal overpressure—10 to 140 bar, heating rate—1 to $3 0 ~ \mathrm { \bf K } / s$ .
